qas.question: Which countries aid Estonia in trilateral defense strategies?
What joint military educational academy does Estonia share with Baltic Countries?
Where is the Baltic Defence College located?
When were the Baltic states asked to join NORDEFCO?

context: Estonia co-operates with <a0_0>Latvia and Lithuania<a0_0/> in several trilateral Baltic defence co-operation initiatives, including Baltic Battalion (BALTBAT), Baltic Naval Squadron (BALTRON), Baltic Air Surveillance Network (BALTNET) and joint military educational institutions such as <a1_0>the Baltic Defence College<a1_0/> in <a2_0>Tartu<a2_0/>. Future co-operation will include sharing of national infrastructures for training purposes and specialisation of training areas (BALTTRAIN) and collective formation of battalion-sized contingents for use in the NATO rapid-response force. In <a3_0>January 2011<a3_0/> the Baltic states were invited to join NORDEFCO, the defence framework of the Nordic countries.
